mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mdm11 ( id, cusitem_fullname_chs, is_disabled, cusitem_name_chs, treeinfo_is_detail, treeinfo_path, cusitem_code, is_completed, cusitem_property, cusitem_category, treeinfo_layer, security_level, def_number_col_01, def_number_col_02, def_number_col_03, def_number_col_04, def_number_col_05, def_number_col_06, def_number_col_07, def_number_col_08, def_number_col_09, last_modified_time ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.cusitemFullnameChs}, #{item.isDisabled}, #{item.cusitemNameChs}, #{item.treeinfoIsDetail}, #{item.treeinfoPath}, #{item.cusitemCode}, #{item.isCompleted}, #{item.cusitemProperty}, #{item.cusitemCategory}, #{item.treeinfoLayer}, #{item.securityLevel}, #{item.defNumberCol01}, #{item.defNumberCol02}, #{item.defNumberCol03}, #{item.defNumberCol04}, #{item.defNumberCol05}, #{item.defNumberCol06}, #{item.defNumberCol07}, #{item.defNumberCol08}, #{item.defNumberCol09}, #{item.lastModifiedTime} )
